paypal.name: PayPal
paypal.instructions: Send payment to "karolshop9@gmail.com" on the PayPal. Include your transaction ID or payment screenshot.

chime.name: Chime
chime.instructions: Send payment to "$Alexander-Moux-2" Chime account. Include your transaction ID or payment screenshot.

paygate.name: Card, Apple Pay, Google Pay
paygate.instructions: Instant payment via card, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or PayPal. You will be redirected to PayGate.to to complete payment.
